title: To Finetune or Not to Finetune: An Experiment in Large Language Model Optimisation | Torchbox

metadata.description: Victor explores the transformative potential of artificial intelligence through finetuning techniques such as Prompt Engineering and Retrieval Augmented Generation. He provides a detailed comparison of these methods with our existing approaches, offering valuable insights into enhancing AI performance.
